briefTitle: Study to Assess the Safety of Repeat Administration of FX006 Administered to Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Knee
officialTitle: An Open-label Study to Assess the Safety of Repeat Administration of FX006 to Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Knee
summary: This is an Open-label Study to Assess the Safety of Repeat Dose of FX006 Administered to Patients with Osteoarthritis (OA) of the Knee

primaryOutcome.measure: Total Number of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) in Patients With Symptomatic Osteoarthritis (OA) of the Knee Who Received Two Doses of 32 mg FX006
